statement: A review of the Administrative Office of the Courts (AOC) FY‑2026 appropriation act and associated public documents found no compliance determinations or enforcement actions issued by the AOC in FY‑2026.  The legislation authorizes funding for specialty and drug court programs but contains no compliance determinations.
statutory_basis:
The FY‑2025/2026 appropriation act for the AOC provides funding for specialty and drug court programs but does not
include any compliance determinations or enforcement actions【884740964066380†L674-L704】【626102372523357†L1110-L1127】.
